name: Grapple Hook (NicholasEckstein)
description:
Use your mouse to grapple onto nodes. Use momentum to fling yourself higher. 

If you go below the screen of left/right of the screen, you lose.

When off screen, you will not lose, IF you are either still attached to a node, or heading back towards the screen.

When you first grapple onto a node, your velocity is multiplied by x1.2 to give a little extra boost. Use that to fling yourself higher.

To come:

  • VFX to make it not look so ugly
  • More inspired menus that don't use Unity's default UI elements.
  • Being able to wrap your grapple hook around multiple nodes
  • Music
  • Sound effects
  • Obstacles
  • Different environments
  • Boosts
